attributes.action: Allow the reasons for the recall of Jon venables to be made public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jon Venables has been recalled to prison. There are many different stories being published by the Tabloids as to the reasons.
The government says its not in the public interest to release the true reasons. I say IT IS in the public interest that we are told the truth. It is my belief that the public deserve to know the truth

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
